Sentencas: Fuel cells are the most efficient means to directly convert stored chemical energy to usable electrical energy (an electrochemical reaction).

Sentencas: Doped ceria is considered to be a promising electrolyte for operation at intermediate temperatures (500 - 600 degrees C).

Sentencas: It has been reported that a reduction of ceria can be neglected at this temperature.

Sentencas: However, such temperatures are not suitable for singly doped ceria as an electrolyte in a SOFC or other devices due to high electrical resistance.
Titulo: Features of electrical conductivity of complex Cu-Mn-ceria-based electrolytes

Sentencas: Structural modification of ceria-based solid solutions by co-doping is one of the possible ways to improve their electrical conductivity at this temperature range.

Sentencas: In this work, tri-doped ceria based solid electrolyte materials for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell were synthesized by the co-precipitation method with sonication.

Sentencas: The materials were characterized via thermogravimetric analysis, X-ray diffraction, scanning electron microscopy, Wagner's polarization technique, and electrochemical impedance spectroscopy.

Sentencas: The powders were isostatically pressed at 150 MPa and sintered at 1000 degrees C for 4 h in air to form electrolyte discs for testing.

Sentencas: The relative densities of all the samples were more than 90% after sintering at 1000 degrees C.

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of these materials was measured by an impedance spectroscopy in the temperature range of 500 - 750 degrees C in air.
